title: Plat III ADC Looking For More Duo/Dynamic
body:
Currently climbing to diamond+, just got double promoted from PlatV-Plat3.   80% Winrate as solo; prefer diamond+ smurfs or people with higher mmr that are eligible to queue with me.  I play ADC/MID for maximum carry XD

Add me ingame:  hey i like you
or reply here

replies.body: Add me. "Lord Birusu" LF partner as well. In between plat5/4. Main top/jg but can play all roles.

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
